name: Obscuro
intro: An Ethereum Layer 2 Blockchain Privacy Protocol
introduce: Obscuro is a layer 2 solution for Ethereum that brings privacy and scale. It ensures the inputs, contract state and execution are always encrypted. Obscuro's programmable privacy allows developers to choose what they want to keep private and what they want to make public at a granular level. Obscuro was incubated by global enterprise software firm R3.
